headline: French sports journalist Christophe Gleizes imprisoned in Algeria: 'If we weren't so sad and devastated, we would laugh'
description: The French journalist was sentenced on June 29 by the Tizi Ouzou court to seven years in prison, to be served immediately. The Algerian judiciary accused him of conducting interviews with a leader of Jeunesse Sportive de Kabylie (JSK), who also heads a pro-independence movement.

headline: Trump flexes political muscle with passage of ‚Äòbig and beautiful‚Äô budget
description: The 'One Big Beautiful Bill' allocates an enormous $165 billion for the effort to deport undocumented migrants, introduces tax cuts benefiting the wealthiest Americans and enacts drastic cuts to Medicaid healthcare coverage. Experts warn that the bill is likely to deepen the US national debt to alarming levels.

headline: Corsican mafia undergoing 'major recomposition,' intelligence report says
description: According to French crime investigators, new power balances are emerging between two blocs on the Mediterranean island: the Petit Bar gang and the Mattei clan, which is uniting groups from various regions.
